parameters.name: CallbackProvisioningConfig
parameters.description: The configuration of event callback synchronization. This parameter is required when the ProvisionProtocolType parameter is set to idaas_callback.

parameters.name: ProvisionPassword
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to synchronize the password in IDaaS user event callbacks. Valid values:

*   true: synchronize the password.
*   false: do not synchronize the password.

parameters.name: ProvisionProtocolType
parameters.description:
The synchronization protocol type of the application. Valid values:

*   idaas_callback: custom event callback protocol of IDaaS.
*   scim2: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) protocol.

parameters.name: ScimProvisioningConfig
parameters.description: The configuration of SCIM-based IDaaS synchronization. This parameter is required when the ProvisionProtocolType parameter is set to scim2.
